attributes.action: That Gordon Brown be tried for treason against Britian and the Queen.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown has commited treason against the British people, Britain and the Queen for allowing Sharia Law and Islam to dominating Britain.
He has also put immergrants and muslims ahead of the British people of this country making them second class citizens in their own country.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
